variants.Description in input context: These mutations are responsible for familial PD (PARK7).

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells with mutant DJ-1 (L166P) showed increased susceptibility to oxidative stress-induced cell death.

Biological replicates.Description: The experiment was repeated with multiple cell cultures.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 expressing cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with empty vector were used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability greater than 80% after 24 hours.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability less than 50% after 24 hours.
